meanings.sent1: She gave the cheekiest grin when caught red-handed.
meanings.sent2: He made the cheekiest remark during the serious meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cheekiest squirrel stole a nut from right under the cat's nose.
meanings.sent4: The cheekiest sunflower stood tallest in the garden, defying the wind.
meanings.sent5: The cheekiest student dared to challenge the teacher's authority in class.

meanings.definition: Showing disrespect or lack of courtesy.
meanings.sent1: His cheekiest behavior towards the elderly was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: The cheekiest guest arrived late without an apology.
meanings.sent3: The cheekiest bird chirped loudly during the solemn ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The cheekiest cloud covered the sun, casting a shadow over the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The cheekiest driver cut in line without signaling, causing chaos.

meanings.sent1: The cheekiest puppy kept stealing socks and wagging its tail mischievously.
meanings.sent2: She had the cheekiest sense of humor, always making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The cheekiest kitten pounced on its own shadow, thinking it was a game.
meanings.sent4: The cheekiest flower in the garden danced in the breeze, showing off its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The cheekiest child challenged their friends to a race, giggling all the way.
